Did Mary arrive on the 1:00 plane, or is she coming on the 3:00 plane?
Did Mary arrive on the 1:00 plane or on the 3:00 plane?
Which plane did Mary arrive on--the 1:00 plane or the 3:00 plane?
Did Sandy want Coke or iced tea?
Is Sandy still at home or did she already leave for the party?
Do you want to go to the cinema or not?
Black or white?
We are going to either the store or the mall.
Bill asked Sandy whether she wanted Coke or iced tea.
